long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developers can open the plug-in and utilize the code scanning function within their app to scan the QR code displayed on the pop-up page of the plug-in. After scanning, they simply need to click the login button on the page to inject the current app login status into the tab page of Chrome.
